colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI SNGAR DON GNYER CAN GZHAN GYIS BSKUL ZHING, PHYIS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG MANG DU MKHYEN CING DAD DANG RNAM DPYOD ZUNG NGU 'BREL BA'I YAR PO'I RAB 'BYAMS PA BRTZON 'GRUS BZANG POS RI KHROD NAS RANG GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO BOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS CO NE'I DGON NHYID DU SBYAR BA STE, PAR GYI YI GE PA NI SNYAN NGAG YIG SDEB SOGS LA BLO SBYANGS PA'I DKA' BCU BLO BZANG DBANG PHYUG GO , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,
